#HumanReproduction #NEET2026 #Class12Biology #NEET2026
2/ Human Reproduction contributes 4-6 questions in NEET annually - one of the highest from Unit 9
3/ Spermatogenesis produces 4 sperms from one spermatogonium; Oogenesis produces only 1 ovum
4/ Fertilization occurs in the ampullary-isthmic junction of the fallopian tube
5/ Implantation happens 7 days after fertilization in the endometrium
6/ hCG hormone in urine forms the basis of pregnancy tests
7/ Parturition is triggered by oxytocin from the posterior pituitary
